/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. In the center of the image, a large tree stands tall, its branches reaching out towards the sky, providing a natural contrast to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image.
